page.title: 01HOW TO PLAY MARBLES
page.content: Two or more players have a marble each. One player rolls his or her marble towards a pot(a pot is a shallow hole in the ground).The other person rolls his or her marble.The person that gets closest or in the pot has the first go.If both people get their marble into the pot they start again.There are two ways to make the marble move. One is thumbing, one is shoving.Thumbing is where you push down on the marble and let it slip forward.Shoving is pushing it with your index finger.The first person to get both marbles into the pot is the winner.People can play for keeps or for lends.Keeps is if you win,lends is whoever wins gives the other person their marble back to{them.
